A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: One of the best Star Wars movies. It's thrilling from the beginning to the end. And the director takes some bold moves that really pays of. There are only two weak scenes in rhe middle of the movie\, where one is outright poorly conceived and executed. But that scene alone does not change the overall complete achievement of this movie. Amazing performances by Mark Hamilton\, Daisy Ridley and Adam Driver.
